attributes.action: Very strict control on drones for private use.
attributes.additional_details:
These drones at some stage will be used to kill and injure, just a matter of time unless there is control on them, better to be safe than sorry after the fact, have put this to the home office some time ago, the news today highlighted that they have come close to planes and may cause a crash getting sucked into an engine.

Needs strong laws in place that control them.
attributes.background:
Drones can be very dangerous as shown to planes, also there is the fact that terrorists could use them and fix explosives to them to kill and injury, also they could be used on our secret sites.

Too many could be and a matter of time before the above latches on to the above.
